description:
A misguided attempt to fix a crick in Breakin`s neck sends Hibiki and the gang back to the past. There, they meet a much younger Hibiki, who is preparing to dance at a festival competition. But will a terrible moment of embarrassment crush his dancing dreams?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Time Slip! Kikkake wa Pantsu Stone?
Time Travel! The Cause Was a Pants Stone?!
タイムスリップ! きっかけはパンツストーン?
